mapper.select: SELECT t.*, (SELECT t2.f_descript FROM t_ware_outtraylocalmap as t1 LEFT JOIN t_base_locationinfo as t2 on t1.f_local_code=t2.f_local_code WHERE t1.f_local_code=t.f_local_code LIMIT 1) as descript FROM t_ware_outtraylocalmap t WHERE f_batch_no = #{batchNo}
SELECT f_mater_code AS materCode,f_batch_no AS batchNo,SUM(f_realout_quality) AS calculateoutoquality FROM t_ware_outtraylocalmap WHERE f_orderdetail_id = #{orderdetailId} GROUP BY f_batch_no
SELECT f_local_code FROM t_ware_outtraylocalmap WHERE f_orderdetail_id = #{orderdetailId}
SELECT * FROM t_ware_outtraylocalmap WHERE f_tray_rfid = #{trayRfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and(f_status=0 OR f_status!=2) AND f_is_delete = 0
UPDATE t_ware_outtraylocalmap SET f_status = 1 WHERE f_sole_code = #{soleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND f_is_delete = 0

SELECT COUNT(t3.f_status) FROM t_ware_outorderdetail t1 LEFT JOIN t_ware_outmainorder t2 ON t1.f_mainorder_id = t2.f_id LEFT JOIN t_ware_outtraylocalmap t3 ON t3.f_orderdetail_id = t1.f_id WHERE t1.f_mainorder_id = #{mainorderId} AND t3.f_status=0

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_ware_outmainorder AS o LEFT JOIN t_ware_outorderdetail AS od ON o.f_id = od.f_mainorder_id LEFT JOIN t_ware_outtraylocalmap AS odl ON od.f_id = odl.f_orderdetail_id LEFT JOIN t_base_locationinfo As bl on bl.f_local_code=odl.f_local_code LEFT JOIN t_base_areainfo as ba on ba.f_id=bl.f_area_id LEFT JOIN t_base_floorinfo as bf on bf.f_id=ba.f_floor_id LEFT JOIN t_ware_locallabelexception as loe on loe.f_local_id = odl.f_local_id LEFT JOIN t_ware_traylabelexception as tre on tre.f_tray_rfid = odl.f_tray_rfid
(odl.f_status != 2 OR odl.f_status IS NULL) and bf.f_floor_code = #{whereCondition.floorCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ware_outtraylocalmap SET f_is_delete = 1 WHERE f_orderdetail_id = #{orderdetailId}
UPDATE t_ware_outtraylocalmap SET f_local_rfid = #{1} WHERE f_local_rfid = #{0} AND f_is_delete =0 AND (f_status=0 OR f_status=2)
